---
title: "protocol_32"
---

Protocol_32.m  - 60deg and 15 deg gratings - very long trial durations
Based on protocol 31
Includes:
- off background interval - pattern 47
- greyscale (4-bit - 3 val) background for interval - pattern 25
60 deg gratings and 15 deg gratings - 2 minute trials - one direction
only.
Flicker as well.
Both at 4Hz and 127 fps.

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 5 |
| Patterns Used | 7 |
| t_acclim_start | 300s |
| t_acclim_end | 30s |
| t_interval | 20s |
| t_flash | 5s |
| t_pause | 0.01 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 127 | 120s | 60 deg gratings - 4Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 2 | [Pattern 10](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_10.qmd) | 8 | 120s | 60 deg gratings - Flicker - 4Hz |
| 3 | [Pattern 4](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_04.qmd) | 32 | 120s | 15 deg gratings - 4Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 4 | [Pattern 4](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_04.qmd) | 127 | 120s | 15 deg gratings - 16Hz - 1 px step pattern |
| 5 | [Pattern 5](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_05.qmd) | 8 | 120s | 15 deg gratings - Flicker - 4Hz |
